scripts.build: RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --features "test" && cp ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/*.wasm ./compiled_contracts/
scripts.build:release: RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cp ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/*.wasm ./compiled_contracts/
